member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.String,Waher.Networking.Sniffers.ISniffer[])
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.
member.param: UDP Multicast address used for cluster communication.
Shared secret. Used to encrypt and decrypt communication. Secret is UTF-8 encoded and then hashed before being fed to AES.
Optional set of sniffers to use.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Byte[],Waher.Networking.Sniffers.ISniffer[])
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.
member.param: UDP Multicast address used for cluster communication.
Shared secret. Used to encrypt and decrypt communication. Secret is hashed before being fed to AES.
Optional set of sniffers to use.

member.summary: IP endpoints listening on.

member.summary: Serializes an object.

member.exception: If the corresponding type, or any of the embedded properties, could not be found.

member.summary: Sends a message using acknowledged service. ("at least once")
member.param: Message to send using acknowledged service.
Method to call when responses have been returned.
State object to pass on to callback method.

member.summary: Sends a message using acknowledged service.

member.summary: Sends a message using assured service. ("exactly once")
member.param: Message to send using acknowledged service.
Method to call when responses have been returned.
State object to pass on to callback method.

member.summary: Sends a message using assured service. ("exactly once")

member.summary: Event raised when current status is needed.

member.summary: Local status. For remote endpoint statuses, see

member.summary: Gets current remote statuses. For the current local status, see

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.AddRemoteStatus(System.Net.IPEndPoint,System.Object)
member.summary: Explicitly adds a remote endpoint status object. In normal operation, calling this method is not necessary, as remote endpoint status is reported over the cluster.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.RemoveRemoteStatus(System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Explicitly removes a remote cluster endpoint status object.
member.returns: If the corresponding endpoint status object was found and removed.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.EndpointOnline
member.summary: Event raised when a new endpoint is available in the cluster.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.EndpointOffline
member.summary: Event raised when an endpoint goes offline.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.EndpointStatus
member.summary: Event raised when status has been reported by an endpoint.

member.summary: Sends an acknowledged ping message to the other servers in the cluster.

State object to pass on to callback method.

member.summary: Sends an acknowledged ping message to the other servers in the cluster.

member.summary: Execute a command on the other members of the cluster, and waits for responses to be returned. Retries are performed in cases responses are not received.
member.param: Method to call when responses have been returned.
State object to pass on to callback method.

member.summary: Execute a command on the other members of the cluster, and waits for responses to be returned. Retries are performed in cases responses are not received.
